title: Precisely controlling and predicting nitrogen release rate of urea–formaldehyde nanocomposite fertilizer for efficient nutrient management
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,1217-1232
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00721A, Paper
Yang Xiang, Xudong Ru, Yaqing Liu, Rui Miao, Yingfang Tong, Mingshan Gong, Yuhan Liu, Guizhe Zhao
“Control plus prediction” concept guides precise preparation and application of UF-based nanocomposite fertilizers.
